title: League Freezes at The Very Beginning of the Game

embed.description: Uploaded by Wizard of Gains on 2016-10-01.

body:
League of Legends will freeze at the very beginning (within 1-3 seconds) of the game on my current laptop.

**I've already (whether it makes a difference or not):**

-Uninstalled and reinstalled the game
-Tried multiple different wifi connections (The problem is present whether ping is 10 or 600)
-Checked temperatures

**Current laptop is an Asus X540LA-SI30205P:**

https://www.amazon.com/Asus-X540LA-SI30205P-15-6-Inch-Laptop-Windows/dp/B01DMNX5PS/ref=sr_1_1?s=pc&ie=UTF8&qid=1475298022&sr=1-1&keywords=asus+laptop+i3]

**Specs (from speccy and online):**

OS: Windows 10 Home 64-bit
CPU: Intel Core i3-5020U 5th Gen Broadwell Dual-Core 2.2GHz 3MB Cache
RAM: 4 GB
Motherboard: ASUSTeK Computer Inc X540LA
Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5500

I'm not sure what the problem is currently. If someone could point me in the right direction that would be very helpful. {{summoner:14}} {{summoner:14}} {{summoner:14}}

replies.body:
The *Game DVR* feature in the Xbox game bar inside windows 10 has been causing freezing issues for some players as a result of some recent windows updates. I recommend [disabling this feature entirely](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to see if it resolves this for you.

Let me know if you have any questions.

Hello, are you a Windows 10 user who got a recent W10 Anniversary update? Please have a look at these threads:
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/gdEazY7E-fps-at-like-2-or-3-recently-all-game-need-help-ever-scince-a-windows-update?comment=0000
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/KFxcVtYK-my-computer-is-randomly-freeezing-mid-game?comment=0000
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/il5Qxm2w-if-you-are-still-having-the-bugsplat-bug-after-champ-select-read-this
